name: Blockverse
description: Your Portal to the DeFiMetaChain Galaxy!
longDescription:
Blockverse is your go-to place in the big world of DeFiMetaChain (DMC). No need to jump between different platforms; we bring everything together in one spot for you.

- One Platform: Get to know all DMC projects, from the big names to the new ones.

- Working Together: We're more than just a list. We help people work together, share ideas, and celebrate new things in the DMC world.

- Your Guide: As DMC grows, stay in the know with Blockverse leading the way.

name: Vanilla Swap
description: A decentralized exchange on DMC, enabling seamless asset swaps.
longDescription: Vanilla Swap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) built on the DeFiChain ecosystem. It provides a platform for users to swap various digital assets in a secure and decentralized manner. By eliminating the need for intermediaries, Vanilla Swap aims to offer a more transparent and efficient trading experience.

name: ebox
description: Innovative Solutions â€“ Reversible Transactions, 100% DeFi OTC
longDescription:
ebox provides services and solutions with a unique character, bringing straight-forward innovation and usability to end users and businesses alike.

With the spirit of community embedded deep within our hearts and vision of the project, having our roots within the trader, investor & enthusiast community ourselves, we understand the needs of our audience, and adjust dynamically to any challenges along our journey.

The ebox On-Chain Escrow offers an unprecedented level of comfort and safety in everyday crypto life through reversible transactions and 100% DeFi OTC trading.

customVideo.title: Crypto sent to a wrong address?

name: MetaLend
description: DeFi Lending at 0% interest! Hedge, Leverage, Time the Top, and more.
longDescription:
MetaLend is DeFiMetaChain's premier DeFi lending service, granting collateralized loans at 0% interest.

Through MetaLend, powerful DeFi maneuvers become possible: Advanced users can hedge and leverage their investment, while applying strategies such as "time the top" to maximize efficiency.

Deployed and maintained by ebox, MetaLend's technological foundation is the Liquity protocol, a clockwork of mechanisms conceived to yield a self-stabilizing lending system. Battle-proven on Ethereum with >$800M TVL and Stability Pool, Liquity provides an immutable, trustless and resilient back-end.

name: OpenDApps Cloud
description: A decentralized Software-as-a-Service platform for EVM projects
longDescription: OpenDApps Cloud gives developers and crypto enthusiasts the tools to deploy smart contracts on the blockchain providing services for them without the need for writing any code or understanding how to manually deploy and manage smart contracts. The platform offers services like token deployments with dynamic tokenomics, staking services, asset backing, native integration with major DEX exchanges, and much more.

name: Javsphere
description: Your Gateway to DeFi Meta Chain Products!
longDescription:
Welcome to Javsphere â€“ Your Simplified Gateway to the World of DeFi Meta Chain (DMC). Our intuitive user interface makes accessing DMC products effortless, while our smart liquidity management ensures cost-effective capital deployment. With Javsphere, you can maximize your DMC rewards, all within a central hub that streamlines your DeFi experience.

At Javsphere, we offer next-generation DeFi tokenized asset products, including StakeX for effortless staking, CryoVault for secure long-term investments, Yield Fusion for amplified DMC yields, AutoPilot for an automated portfolio rebalancing and Booster to leverage tokenized assets. Our $JAV token functions as a reward token as well as utility token for our products.

name: Million Pixel DFI
longDescription:
You will get a piece of DeFi Meta Chain history!

The main use case is online advertising and fun. You can purchase pixels for displaying images (for example, your company or project logo) with a link to your website. Your purchased advertising will be stored in a smart contract on the DeFi Meta Chain and will remain there as long as the DeFi Meta Chain exists, which is essentially forever.

In addition, with your purchase, you also support the community by burning ðŸ”¥ 40% of the tokens.

customVideo.title: How to Buy Pixels on Million Pixel DFI
customVideo.description: Buy pixels, set link, upload image â€“ step-by-step guide.

name: CRYPTO FACTOR
description: A World of Decentralised Infrastructure Execution
longDescription:
Crypto Factor will explore fresh DeFi Infrastructure concepts and bring this to the community in simplified and usable form. This is achieved by combining decentralised entities with programability to provide digital Infrastructure as an Executable (single-click deployment). Entity > Token > PreSale > DEX Listing > Staking > Asset Backing and much more in a single execution, initially available for operators with a low entry threshold to encourage participation.

The ecosystem is bootstrapped by the Crypto Factor Token which serves as an exchange of value and entry criteria for product platform use. We will be embarking on a DeFi exploration with all concepts that are robustly developed and considered production ready integrated into the Product Platform for user/operators to use and build with.

Crypto Factor does not provide advice or funding meaning the ecosystem forms a true enabler to allow others to build out DeFi Solutions in any direction to any extent to fulfil their requirements.
